ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce eqP to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

original: intros a b p q H1 H2. unfold eqP, pluspf, pX in *. rewrite H1. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
